txt.en: A bounty has been taken out on Bill Tripper, a notorious tomb-robber known for his skill with blades.

The poster advertises a bounty on a man named Bill Tripper, described as a 'notorious tomb-robber, highly-skilled with blades,' and invites interested parties to seek out Clark Standish in Ost Forod for details and to apply for the commission.

Clark Standish is in Ost Forod, the old watch-post in the hills of Tyrn Fornech.\n\nA poster advertising a bounty for the capture or defeat of a tomb-robber named Bill Tripper caught your eye. If you would like to apply for this bounty, you should speak with Clark Standish.

'You're here to see about the bounty on Bill Tripper? I'm glad to hear it -- the sooner we're rid of him, the better, if you ask me!

'Bill has been robbing and murdering around the hills of Tyrn Fornech for some months now, and it's well-past time someone stopped him. Last I heard, he'd travelled south into Parth Aduial and was holed up in a big ruin south of the cross-roads... Tham Varan, I think it was called.

'If you do go looking to collect the bounty, keep an eye on Bill's sword -- he's deadly with it, and I'd just as soon not have your death on my conscience!'
Bill Tripper is in the ruins of Tham Varan in Parth Aduial, south of the cross-roads of Canadiach.\n\nYou have accepted the commission of the bounty on Bill Tripper.
Clark Standish is in Ost Forod, the old watch-post in the hills of Tyrn Fornech.\n\nYou have defeated Bill Tripper and should now report back to Clark Standish.
'Good luck with that villain, Bill Tripper. You should find him in Parth Aduial, in the big ruins south of the cross-roads. The ruins are called Tham Varan, I think.'
'So you're the one that finally put an end to old Bill Tripper? Very good! If you report to Basil Gummidge, the arbiter of Ost Forod, he'll give you your reward.'
Basil Gummidge is in Ost Forod, the old watch-post in the hills of Tyrn Fornech.\n\nYou have defeated Bill Tripper and should now report to Basil Gummidge to collect your reward.
'Basil Gummidge, our arbiter, is here in Ost Forod. Speak to him about the business of your reward.'
'You have put an end to Bill Tripper, I understand? Very good! Here is your reward, and well-deserved it is, too!'
'You did a good job with that Bill Tripper!'
'Bill Tripper had been a real problem for awhile now.'
'Bill Tripper won't cross innocent travellers anymore!'
Bounty: Bill Tripper, Master of Blades
'It's good to know that Bill Tripper won't be a problem anymore.'
